entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Breton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Breton 12:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
